description: Tapestry: Le Retour de la chasse, from L'Histoire de l'empereur de la Chine Series; After cartoons by Guy-Louis Vernansal (French, 1648 - 1729), and Jean-Baptiste Monnoyer (French, 1636 - 1699), and Jean-Baptiste Belin de Fontenay (French, 1653 - 1715), et al; Beauvais, France; 1697 to 1705; Wool and silk; modern cotton lining; 421.4 × 290 cm (165 7/8 × 114 3/16 in.); 83.DD.340; J.
